answers.answer: My aunt failed both tests years ago when she was pregnant.  She ended up getting gestational diabetes. Scary! But she delivered a happy and healthy baby. Her pregnancy just required a lot more work.Healthier eating, pricking fingers, etcDid you eat anything sugary before the test?? I hear that can give some off results sometimes! Crossing my fingers everything goes smoothly
I failed the 1 hour and when I went back for the 3 hour I passed it so you should be fine just don't eat anything after 12 midnight nor in the morning till after your test is done

question: So I failed. She said the normal is 120 and my test came back as 170!!!! OMG! I never failed with my last two pregnancies..  so now I have to go back in Tuesday  and do a three hour screening.  Anyone else had to do this? Did you pass or fail?
title: failed my 1 hour glucose test.
